Lists and Links

  • Automatically generate citations and bibliography:
  • Cite using pandoc citations format: pandoc-citeproc
  • Style with Citation Style Language
  • Generate DB of citations in Better BibLaTeX¬† format from Zotero.

Code

var unified = require('unified')
var markdown = require('remark-parse')
var remark2rehype = require('remark-rehype')
var doc = require('rehype-document')
var format = require('rehype-format')
var html = require('rehype-stringify')
var report = require('vfile-reporter')
unified()
  .use(markdown)
  .use(remark2rehype)
  .use(doc, {title: 'üëãüåç'})
  .use(format)
  .use(html)
  .process('# Hello world!', function(err, file) {
    console.error(report(err || file))
    console.log(String(file))
  })
